## Data Transformation in Excel

[! [Data transformation in Excel](https://i.ytimg.com/vi_webp/gR2IY5Naja0/sddefault.webp)](https://youtu.be/gR2IY5Naja0)

You'll learn data transformation techniques in Excel, covering:

- **Calculating Ratios**: Compute metro area to city area and metro population to city population ratios. - **Using Pivot Tables**: Create pivot tables to aggregate data and identify outliers. - **Filtering Data**: Apply filters in pivot tables to analyze specific subsets of data. - **Counting Data Occurrences**: Use pivot tables to count the frequency of specific entries. - **Creating Charts**: Generate charts from pivot table data to visualize distributions and outliers. Here are links used in the video:

- [List of Largest Cities Excel file](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jl8tHGoxmIba4J78aJVfT9jtZv7lfCbV/view)
